Skip To main content View prices View all Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston Dwtn - WestEdge 
Important Announcements
Conveniently located near Downtown Charleston 
Experience true Southern hospitality at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston Downtown-WestEdge. Conveniently located just minutes from Charleston’s historic district, our hotel is the perfect home base for exploring the charm and beauty of the Lowcountry. Enjoy easy access to the vibrant WestEdge Retail Center, Joe Riley Baseball Field—home of the Charleston Riverdogs—and top institutions like The Citadel, College of Charleston, and The Medical University of South Carolina (MUSC). Plus, we're centrally located near Charleston’s historic plantations, scenic golf courses, and pristine beaches.

If you’d rather relax at the hotel, we offer a complimentary Express Start® hot breakfast buffet, a beautiful outdoor saltwater pool, and a spacious lobby lounge. Unwind on our open patio terrace while taking in the city views, or enjoy the comfort of our modern and well-appointed guest rooms. At Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston Downtown-WestEdge, you’ll find exceptional service, modern amenities, and a welcoming atmosphere that makes every stay memorable.

The highlights

Steps to MUSC

Complimentary Hot Breakfast Bar

Parking Made Easy

We Love Pets

Your Charleston Adventure Awaits

Steps to MUSC

Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston Dwtn – WestEdge puts you right by the Medical University of South Carolina, Roper St. Francis Hospital and the surrounding medical district- ideal for patient visits, appointments, rotations, and campus tours. Our WestEdge location makes getting to MUSC simple and stress-free.
Call
 
 +1-843-7224000 Call
 
 +1-843-7224000 
Complimentary Hot Breakfast Bar

To start your day off right, we offer a hot, delicious full breakfast bar with fresh pastries, bagels, sausage, bacon, eggs, "make our own pancakes", and of course, our famous cinnamon rolls! If you're looking for healthier options, we also offer fresh fruit, yogurt, hard-boiled eggs, juice, oatmeal and cereals.
Call
 
 +1-843-7224000 Call
 
 +1-843-7224000 
Parking Made Easy

The hotel offers limited on-site parking for guests at an additional cost. If on-site parking is full there is overflow parking in the parking garage across from the hotel at the same cost. This garage is located across Horizon St. and is shared with the Publix supermarket. Oversized vehicles please call for parking information.
Call
 
 +1-843-7224000 Call
 
 +1-843-7224000 
We Love Pets

Bring your four-legged family member with you while you travel and explore beautiful downtown Historic Charleston. We do accept pets up to 75lbs with a maximum of 2 pets per room. The pet fee is $50 per night per pet.
Call
 
 +1-843-7224000 Call
 
 +1-843-7224000 
Your Charleston Adventure Awaits

We are located just minutes away from Charleston’s historic district, giving guests the perfect place to stay for all their Lowcountry adventures. We are approximately 1.4 miles from the Charleston City Market, where most of your sightseeing adventures await.
Call
 
 +1-843-7224000 Call
 
 +1-843-7224000 Explore Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston Dwtn - WestEdge

FAQs for Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston Dwtn - WestEdge
Does Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston Dwtn - WestEdge have a pool? 
Yes, Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston Dwtn - WestEdge has an outdoor pool.
How much is parking at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston Dwtn - WestEdge? 
At Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston Dwtn - WestEdge, self-parking is available for a daily rate of 15 USD .
Can I bring my pet to Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston Dwtn - WestEdge? 
Pets are welcome at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston Dwtn - WestEdge. Our Pet Policy: 2 pets max per room. Fifty Dollars per pet, per day. Pets must not be left alone in rooms. Dogs and cats only. Some breed restrictions.
Can I cancel my booking at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston Dwtn - WestEdge for a full refund? 
Always check the hotel's cancellation policy before booking a rate. Room cancellation is subject to rate booked at time of reservation and cancellation policy varies by rate.
Does Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston Dwtn - WestEdge have a restaurant on site? 
No, there is no on site restaurant at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston Dwtn - WestEdge.
Is there free breakfast available at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston Dwtn - WestEdge? 
Breakfast is free with your stay at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston Dwtn - WestEdge.
When is breakfast at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston Dwtn - WestEdge? 
Breakfast at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston Dwtn - WestEdge is available from 6:30 AM to 9:30 AM.
Is there a complimentary shuttle available at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston Dwtn - WestEdge? 
No, there is not a complimentary local area shuttle available at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston Dwtn - WestEdge.
What are the check-in and check-out times for Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston Dwtn - WestEdge? 
Check-in at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston Dwtn - WestEdge is from 4:00 PM, and check-out time is 11:00 AM. Contact the hotel directly for options available for early check-in or late check-out.
Does Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston Dwtn - WestEdge offer free Wi-Fi? 
Yes, the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston Dwtn - WestEdge offers free WiFi!
